task.title: Fix SDK publish to include freshly built broker binary

events.content: publish-sdk-only job was missing broker binary download: publish-sdk-only job was missing broker binary download

raw.question: publish-sdk-only job was missing broker binary download
raw.chosen: publish-sdk-only job was missing broker binary download
raw.reasoning: The job only depended on 'build' (TS compilation) and used --ignore-scripts which skipped prepack/bundle:binary. It shipped whatever stale binary was checked into packages/sdk/bin/ instead of the freshly compiled one from the build-broker CI job.

events.content: Removed 13MB broker binary from git tracking: Removed 13MB broker binary from git tracking

raw.question: Removed 13MB broker binary from git tracking
raw.chosen: Removed 13MB broker binary from git tracking
raw.reasoning: Binary is built fresh by CI during every publish (build-broker job). Local dev resolves to target/release/ via client.ts resolveDefaultBinaryPath(). No reason to bloat the repo with a stale binary.

events.content: Updated .gitignore from stale packages/broker-sdk/bin/ to packages/sdk/bin/agent-relay-broker*: Updated .gitignore from stale packages/broker-sdk/bin/ to packages/sdk/bin/agent-relay-broker*

raw.question: Updated .gitignore from stale packages/broker-sdk/bin/ to packages/sdk/bin/agent-relay-broker*
raw.chosen: Updated .gitignore from stale packages/broker-sdk/bin/ to packages/sdk/bin/agent-relay-broker*
raw.reasoning: The old entry referenced a renamed package. Updated to match the current SDK path and prevent the binary from being re-committed.

retrospective.summary: Fixed publish-sdk-only CI job to download freshly built broker binaries from build-broker artifacts into packages/sdk/bin/. Removed stale 13MB binary from git tracking and updated .gitignore.
